Package cz.ziki.had.pawn.food

Class Apple

java.lang.Object
cz.ziki.had.pawn.CommonGameObject
cz.ziki.had.pawn.food.CommonFood
cz.ziki.had.pawn.food.Apple
All Implemented Interfaces:
Food, GameObject, Serializable
public class Apple extends CommonFood implements Food
Represents an Apple in the game, which is a type of food that the snake can eat.

  • Constructor Details

    • Apple

      public Apple(Rect background, Snake snake, int x, int y)
      Constructs an Apple object.
      Parameters:
      background - the game field where the apple will appear
      snake - the snake object that interacts with the apple
      x - the x-coordinate of the apple's initial position
      y - the y-coordinate of the apple's initial position

  • Method Details

    • loadImage

      public void loadImage()
      Loads the image for the Apple object. The image is extracted from a sprite sheet and scaled to fit the tile size.
      Specified by:
      loadImage in interface Food

    • spawn

      public void spawn()
      Spawns the apple at a random position on the game field.
      Specified by:
      spawn in interface Food

    • update

      public void update(double dt)
      Updates the apple's state. This method checks if the apple has been eaten by the snake.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Food
      Specified by:
      update in interface GameObject
      Parameters:
      dt - the time delta, used for time-based updates

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws the apple on the game field if it hasn't been eaten.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface Food
      Specified by:
      draw in interface GameObject
      Parameters:
